#Text=Celebrate Dad with a Rental Projector
#Text=Does your dad really need another tie ?
#Text=Whether you 're celebrating dad for Father 's Day , his birthday , or " just because , " look at all the great reasons to gift him a weekend rental projector .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Rent a projector .
#Text=Most rentals are fairly affordable ( $ 130 - 160 for a full weekend ) , but if that 's outside your price range , consider asking your siblings to chip in .
#Text=You can rent online and have it delivered most anywhere , or rent from a local rental shop ( available if you live in a fairly large city ) .
#Text=Buy your dad an excellent greeting card , or make a " certificate " on your computer .
#Text=This is a fun and unique way to gift an intangible present , like a weekend projector rental .
#Text=Talk to the rest of the family to decide on a weekend that works best for the rental .
#Text=When is everyone available for at least one afternoon or evening ?
#Text=Choose a theme ( or let Dad decide ) .
#Text=Check out the Tips section for ideas .
#Text=Rent movies or arrange for pay-per-view if dad wants to watch the big game , or a heavyweight fight .
#Text=It 's easy to connect a rental projector to your television , DVD player , or laptop computer .
#Text=Provide the snacks .
#Text=Remember to choose the snacks dad likes to munch on -- whether that includes fried chicken and chili , or salted nuts , sweets and popcorn .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Part of the fun of this gift involves family participation , so be sure to rent the projector on a weekend when everyone can attend .
#Text=If you ca n't arrange this ahead of time , give Dad a gift certificate for a date " TBA " and work with the family to get it scheduled .
#Text=You might let Dad decide what he wants to watch during his weekend rental , but here are some suggestions .
#Text=Sports weekend .
#Text=This might involve renting a projector during Super Bowl weekend , the Indy 500 , a boxing match , or the Final Four ( depending on what 's upcoming , and what dad loves best ) .
#Text=Film Fest .
#Text=Choose dad 's favorite films and gather the family to watch these classics together .
#Text=Family Movies .
#Text=Have old home movies transferred to DVD and showcase them in larger-than-life format with a rental projector for dad and the family to enjoy together .
#Text=Surprise Night at the Movies .
#Text=Let each person choose a film dad has n't seen , but that he 's sure to love .
#Text=Combo Ticket .
#Text=Choose from one or more of the above options , or create your own .
#Text=For example , perhaps your dad loves video games -- in which case you can hook up a rental projector to your favorite gaming system .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Remember to keep the focus more on dad , as opposed to the wants or desires of you and your siblings .
#Text=Do n't book the projector rental until you 've talked with dad to ensure he 's game , and available .
